A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fanfic gone horribly wrong\, Star Wars: the last Jedi is a which looks like they took scenes from episodes 5 and 6 and copy/pasted them into a horribly made film which is pulling for Kathleen kennedys out of date and out of touch SJW agenda and is essentially a propaganda piece where I watched a horrific casino scene for near 30 minutes just so the plan it revolved around could collapse and so I could get an animal rights message. This movie is so bad and so unfunny that I longed for the days of Jar Jar Binks and re-releases. I wish I hadn't spent my money on it. If you're going to go anyhow and see this train wreck\, fine\, but I wouldn't take your kids\, you don't want them to think this movie is what Star Wars is meant to be.
